Percival's feathered embroidered obsidian black madeira lace crow mask:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Misc:Masks:MaskHide]#210866\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of black silk thread -\> Netted teardrops decorate the edges of the mask, the floral patterns of the lace hugging the intricate features of the face and accentuating the curvature of the cheeks and jawline. ([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's madeira lace-overlaid embroidered shimmering black sheer viole wrap-around dress:\<[Allegory:Props:Clothing:Dresses:WrapAround]#70777\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of black silk thread -\> Tacked in place with ornate black silk stitchwork, the obsidian black madeira lace hugs the curvature of the body with strategically placed floral patterns covering the swell of the bosom, the patterned overlay sweeping down the center of the torso before encircling the waist and hips and trailing the thighs to pool centrally along the bottom of the shimmering black sheer fabric of the dress. Teardrops of netted lace create a decorative border to the lace overlay, the pattern mirrored in the narrow line of delicate lace that follows the sinuous curve of the spine before culminating in a single teardrop at the raised peak of lacework that sweeps upward from the front to cover the buttocks and accentuate the curve of the hips.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Front", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:55): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368912", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368912", "TimeClosed":"1645368912", "TimeFiled":"1645023442" ])

At the corner of the right eye, a singular teardrop trails to mid-cheek, the stitches doubled over to add dimensionality to the accent.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Front", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:55): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368912", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368912", "TimeClosed":"1645368912", "TimeFiled":"1645024566" ])

Lidia's engraved vivid viridian emerald and golden polished brass serpent belt:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Belts:Serpent]#30924\> -\> Scaled from end to end, the body of the belt is covered in fine metal plating featuring delicate, overlapping crescents of golden polished brass which take the form of smooth snake scales. Either eye have been set with a cabochon that has been etched from beneath in the manner of reverse intaglio to lend realistic dimensionality in the form of slit pupils.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:55): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368913", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368912", "TimeClosed":"1645368913", "TimeFiled":"1645228390" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Lidia's pair of engraved emerald-accented pale teal sapphire and golden polished brass coral stud earrings:\<[IronClaw:Props:Jewelry:Earrings:Aquatic:CoralStud]#128688\> -\> \\r\\n Strewn amidst the colorful glimmer of coral formations, delicate golden metalwork and minuscule emerald pieces take the shape of a multitude of aquatic creatures interspersing the piece. A miniature cuttlefish skulks near the base, top half predominantly encrusted in the smallest of emeralds that fade into golden hued brass. Tiny sea stars with emerald-pocked bodies glimmer with a golden sheen up one side, while a school of small fire fish peek their minuscule, long-finned bodies betwixt the gem-strewn limbs", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:54): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368898", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368898", "TimeClosed":"1645368898", "TimeFiled":"1645309655" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Lidia's engraved goldenrod hessonite garnet and rich polished gold archaic ring:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Rings:Archaic]#18427\> -\> The entirety of the band has been meticulously engraved to appear as if a paper-wrapped shank with illegible type-print inscribed on multiple sheaves, which seemingly loop one over the other to create the entirety of the band. Rising from the base of the band, the faceted metal shoulders of the setting surround a shield cut goldenrod hessonite garnet at the center, boasting beveled edging and a broad, flat surface. The face of the gemstone has been left smooth and crystal clear so that a detailed etching beneath the stone itself shines through in a frosty, three-dimensional silhouette of a many-petaled sunflower, enclosed under a clear geometric dome.\\r\\n\\r\\n Known as reverse intaglio etching, the effect on the gem is created by painstakingly grinding into the flat back with minute scribing tools utilizing a diamond paste to create a three-dimensional frosted silhouette. The back of the stone has been left open rather than enclosed so that any available light shines through to make the internal glyptic floral facets shimmer.\\r\\n", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:SpanishBar:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:54): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368899", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368898", "TimeClosed":"1645368899", "TimeFiled":"1645314054" ])

Centered upon the brow, a risen engraving of a many-petaled sunflower reaches its broad serrated leaves to either side, curling over the printed surface of the golden hued metal. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:54): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368899", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368899", "TimeClosed":"1645368899", "TimeFiled":"1645314334" ])

Lidia's engraved golden reflective brass livery collar:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Necklace:LiveryCollar]#278286\> -\> Comprised primarily of broad, rectangular medallion links of golden hued metal which take the shape of many-paged tomes, this livery collar boasts a large central golden topaz medallion in the shape of a large, many-petaled sunflower. The surface of the sunny stone has been painstakingly etched to appear as if covered in a spiral of miniature seeds, the medallion itself centered upon the wearer's chest. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:54): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368899", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368899", "TimeClosed":"1645368899", "TimeFiled":"1645314831" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! Elle's painted pale porcelain silk mask:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Misc:Masks:MaskHide]#2818\> -\> The silken porcelain surface of the mask has been painted with a contrasting deep ebony color in a minuscule harlequin diamond pattern that covers the mask from top to bottom. The repeating pattern creates a visual distortion of the curvature of the facial features. In striking contrast to this stark black and white pattern, the lips of the mask have been adorned with a dark scarlet paint in a tiny heart shape that accentuates the cupid's bow of the upper lip and comes to a sharp point just under the lower lip. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:el:elle", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southwest:AnasetteApartments:FirstFloor:Virtual:GuestRoomNorth]#112218", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:54): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368899", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368899", "TimeClosed":"1645368899", "TimeFiled":"1645321760" ])

([ "Account":"robertg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of Dancing on a Barge. The picture is tilted quite a bit from level. The strokes are fast, imprecise and colorful. The strokes create a mess of pants and skirts and women dancing. This is not a perfect painting, the mess of colors seems it could almost be a beta fish. Of the many shapes, only a few have any attempt at the detail. One forms a woman with her slender legs doing the splits in the air. Below a comedy mask, a curvaceous woman sways her hips dancingly.\\r\\nThe floor is orange with a few colorful day beds. A woman in red sits on one. Above that, the moonlight reflects off of the surface of the water, level with the canvas, but not the rest of the picture. Above, circles of light seem to swing. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Artist:Canvas]#176289\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:kj:kjell", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:le:lee", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Special:Carnevale:Boat", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Kjell (Feb 20 09:54): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645368899", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645368899", "TimeClosed":"1645368899", "TimeFiled":"1645334513" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's beaded embroidered deep plum cisele velvet slashed-sleeved doublet:\<[Allegory:Props:Clothing:Doublets:SlashedSleeved]#241085\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of gold silk thread -\> The torso of the garment is free from adornment, the deep plum luster of the fabric contrasted by the heavily ornamented slashed sleeves. Accentuating the burnished gold lining, ribbons of gold silk embroidery follow the pleats of the full sleeves in a complex foliate pattern, the chaotic tumble of twining vines embellished with a patternless collection of gold beads in clusters of three, each accent given a floral appearance by the addition of embroidered petals at the base of each delicate glass decoration. The cuffs are similarly embroidered with a chaotic bed of layered foliage, the gold silk thread heavily pillowed to give added structure and weight to the billowing slashed sleeves of the doublet.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Front", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 23 09:23): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645626205", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645626205", "TimeClosed":"1645626205", "TimeFiled":"1645381326" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's pair of beaded deep plum embroidered cisele velvet slashed trunk hose:\<[Allegory:Props:Clothing:Pants:TrunkHoseSlashed]#145710\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of gold silk thread -\> Following the line of the cartridge pleating and adorning the deep plum outer layer of fabric is a gold glass bead-adorned embroidery of lush foliate patterns. These tumbling, twining vines cross back and forth over each ribbon of deep plum in a swirling switchback zig zag formation before encircling the bottom hem in prodigious layers of gold silk leaves accentuated by trios of glimmering glass beads evocative of floral clusters, minuscule petals stitched at the base of each tiny bead to complement the silken luster of the deep plum fabric and reflect off the small glass adornments.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Front", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 23 09:23): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645626205", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645626205", "TimeClosed":"1645626205", "TimeFiled":"1645381383" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' iron gae bolga spear:\<[Allegory:Props:Weapons:Pole:Medium:GenericSpear]#178115\> -\> The teeth of the spearhead have been forged to a dramatic taper, each mirrored pair wider than the last as they grow closer to the weapon's haft, the broadest at the base approximately four inches in width. Engraved to resemble a raven's feather, each arced tooth is worked in intricate detail down to the individual barbs, the distal edge of every plume honed to a sharp bevel to aid in the piercing of soft tissue. Shallow striations span the full length of the piece's haft, the narrow grooves running in sinuous parallel to one another with ringed whorls located at random to lend the seven-foot grip a timbered appearance.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Outlands:Settlements:Northwest:Smithy", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 23 09:23): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645626205", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645626205", "TimeClosed":"1645626205", "TimeFiled":"1645396576" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! SCULPTURE ! sculpture of Ganesha. An elephant-headed, potbellied deity boasting many arms which cradle various representations of Ganesha's religious symbolism has been crafted entirely of white limestone. Draped in swaths of stone which has been painstakingly shaped and sanded to appear as silken cloth, the God boasts ornamentation at each wrist, and the haloed Mukut crown of divinity. Large, fanned ears spread to either side of the elephant's head, symbolizing wisdom in listening, and hearing all, and a single tusk, where the other has been broken, representing the wisdom of being beyond duality, in the belief that all things and beings are of one great source. The long, wrinkled trunk of the deity symbolizes adaptability with finesse in discrimination, and immense strength, given that the limb is capable of both uprooting a tree, and lifting the finest of needles. \\r\\n\\r\\n The four thick arms of the otherwordly creature are held at various angles. The topmost pair are held before his torso, one hand cradling a laddus, never eaten, as a wise man does not partake of the rewards of his deeds, for he is not attached to them, and the other with palm facing forward in an offering of blessing to all. The two arms at his sides bend upward at an angle, the left hand grasping a hatchet, which embodies old karma, all the sanskars and accumulating deeds, both good and bad, in the past being cut from ones being when enlightenment comes. The opposite hand clutches a lotus blossom, the symbol of enlightenment. Ganesha is shown sitting with one foot on the ground and the other resting upon his opposite knee, reminding that the wise person is of this earth, yet not entirely of this earth. The entirety of the piece shows wear, and age in many places where it has been touched in reverence, scraped, and scuffed, revealing the age of the creation. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#151188\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Stonemason:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 23 09:23): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645626206", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645626206", "TimeClosed":"1645626206", "TimeFiled":"1645495019" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Polgara's engraved silver maple wall shelf:\<[Allegory:Props:Furniture:Storage:Shelf:Wall]#149737\> -\> A tapering arch bows atop the back of the shelf, with elongated petal-like crenelations within the inner edge, creating an open area of woodwork riding upon the wall in a floral-like, ogee crest. Openwork cinquefoil carvings festoon the cuspid peak with a weave-carved, depressed veneer backing comprised of perforated circles piercing the maple in such a way to appear as if woven reed screening lying flush against the wall. Moresque marquetry brackets support the upright trefoil framework on either side of the shelf's beveled base.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Carpenter:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 23 09:23): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645626206", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645626206", "TimeClosed":"1645626206", "TimeFiled":"1645570530" ])

Polgara's engraved silver maple cupboard:\<[IronClaw:Props:Furniture:Storage:Cabinet:Cupboard]#206630\> -\> The corners, and overall framework of the cupboard is comprised of ornate Moresque marquetry, boasting arcaded spandrels, or curved, decorative polyfoiled arches, bolstering every corner in elaborate woodworked frieze. The cabinet doors, sides and back are crafted in the form of Mashrabiya panels in an encompassing openwork display of interconnected beading, lending the appearance of ornamental screening, which allows the cabinet's contents to peek through.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Carpenter:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 23 09:23): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645626206", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645626206", "TimeClosed":"1645626206", "TimeFiled":"1645570669" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! Elle's beaded painted pale porcelain silk mask:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Misc:Masks:MaskHide]#142020\> -\> Covering the majority of the pale porcelain silk is an ornate painted pattern in lustrous burnish gold strokes, the furling spirals of shimmering color complementing the glittering of the glass beads stitched along the perimeter of the mask. In addition to this delicate border, a trio of beaded strands dangles from the left temple to mid-cheek, accentuating the painted gold eye mask. Shading in the strokes gives the impression of an eyemask worn over the full face silken face covering, elaborate foliate whorls given increased dimension around the eye holes and over the bridge of the nose. At the opposite temple, a singular lily blossom has been teased into a sense of dimension with delicate brushstrokes, the deep plum color standing in stark contrast to the pale porcelain silk and the myriad hues of gold paint used to decorate it. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:el:elle", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Ballroom:SecondFloor:Virtual:SittingRoom]#232718", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 23 09:23): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645626207", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645626207", "TimeClosed":"1645626207", "TimeFiled":"1645583457" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Polgara's engraved bloodstained mesquite witch doctor mask:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Misc:Masks:MaskHide]#221736\> -\> Crafted primarily from a dark colored mesquite in a convex, almost cabochon shape where the face rounds outward in a semi-spherical dome from brow and chin, this mask boasts depressed, slitted eye holes rimmed in blood red circles, a flat nose, and square-lipped mouth. Striated lines, where the wood has been carved deep through the darker stain upon the surface to reveal lighter wood grain beneath, decorate the surface of the mask. Bowing from either temple, a parallel series of engraved channels arch across the brow to dip downward at a line which bisects the face down the center and ends just above the bridge of the mask's nose. A similar series of engravings encompass jaw and cheeks of the mask, sweeping downward in an opposing curve to reach the square-lipped mouth, and 'v' over the flat nose in a repeated chevron pattern.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Carpenter:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Feb 24 23:40): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645764022", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645764022", "TimeClosed":"1645764022", "TimeFiled":"1645659079" ])

Percival's embroidered rich brown suede bear mask:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Misc:Masks:MaskHide]#49714\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of black silk thread -\> The mask is vividly detailed with an elaborate embroidery of a snarling bear, the details of the crinkled snout and jowls teased into a realistic sense of dimension by the ornate black silk stitches. A furrowed brow is outlined with minute stitches to represent the lush fur of the beast, the pattern continuing to cover the entire surface of the suede mask. The lining of the mask in red velvet is contrasted on the front by a set of embroidered white fangs that glint against the warm dark tones of the material beneath, a singular droplet of blood red stitched at the base of one of the fangs.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Front", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Feb 24 23:40): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645764022", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645764022", "TimeClosed":"1645764022", "TimeFiled":"1645714792" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's embroidered rich mulberry brocatelle brocade butterfly mask:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Misc:Masks:MaskHide]#128855\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of silver silk thread -\> A fan of delicate silver silk stitches evocative of butterfly wings spreads over the curvature of the mask, the stitches glinting in the light against the deep purple color of the silken material beneath. The minuscule embroidered stitches create a pattern reminiscent of silver filigree, the wispy whorled butterfly wings accentuating the eye holes of the mask and culminating in spirals of silver silk thread dissipating into the shadowy silver silk lace trim that fans outward from the edges of the mask as though an extension of the delicate diaphanous wings of the creature.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Front", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Feb 24 23:40): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645764022", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645764022", "TimeClosed":"1645764022", "TimeFiled":"1645715916" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' engraved diamond-inset pristine white polished steel rapier:\<[Allegory:Props:Weapons:Bladed:Swords:Light:Rapier]#62452\> -\> A series of eight intertwined quillions radiates from the juncture of the weapon's blade and pommel in an aimless web of pristine white polished steel bands to form a protective cage for the hand. Each of these quillions is tapered as it extends towards its termination at the butt of the pommel, flowing seamlessly into a singular point at the base of the spherical sword knot decorating the grip of the rapier. Interspersed at random amidst the sweeping network of steel are tiny diamond cabochons of varying sizes which glitter a warm chocolate hue as the piece moves in the light, complemented by a larger inlay of opalescent white gold set into the distal curve of the sword knot itself. The ricasso of the narrow blade has been likewise embellished on either face with a matching piece of gold carved into the shape of a solitary oak leaf, inset flush within the hammered flat surface.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Outlands:Settlements:Northwest:Smithy", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 26 08:46): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645883173", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645883173", "TimeClosed":"1645883173", "TimeFiled":"1645806046" ])

([ "Account":"robertg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of Christmas Collaboration. You see a decorative scene before you that consists: A white marbled-veined fireplace has been tucked safely to the left side of this portrait. A towering spruce tree is decorated with various decorations. Colorful gifts surround the bottom of the branches of this towering tree. The dark stoned walls are graced with a wreath, colorful streamers, and other various decor. Soft-edged strokes make up a towering spruce tree. Colorful ornaments are dotted around the tree. Colorful squares and rectangles make up the presents around the tree. The left side of the tree is lighter. The source of this light is a bright blocky marble fireplace. Darker stone walls contrast to this light but are decorated with colorful streamers and a wreath. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Artist:Canvas]#120504\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:le:lee", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Plazas:PiazzaVecchia:Fountain", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Feb 26 08:46): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1645883173", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1645883173", "TimeClosed":"1645883173", "TimeFiled":"1645838388" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's embroidered opaline waterlily blue samite coral-crowned undine mask:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Misc:Masks:MaskHide]#215982\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of pearly white silk thread -\> The opaline waterlily blue samite surface of the mask has been adorned with ornate stitch work in pearly white silk, highlighting and over-exaggerating the cheekbones and brow line to create an effect of sunken cheeks and fin-like protrusions at the sides of the face. Following the scalloped lines of these adornments, moonlight white gauze lace has been stiffened by and accentuated with stitches reminiscent of coral branches to rise over the crown of the head in a sheer fan of elaborate lacework. Detailing the otherwise smooth samite surface of the mask, embroidery evocative of lace covers the nose and cheekbones in small freckles with details reminiscent of barnacles.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Mar 3 12:44): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1646329481", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1646329481", "TimeClosed":"1646329481", "TimeFiled":"1645911475" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBOSSING ! Frederic's embossed grey leather book:\<[Allegory:Props:Writing:Books:FabricBook]#249561\> -\> With silver gilt edged pages and worn silver highlights along the contours of the embossing, this resource book shows signs of regular use and frequent handling, the dog-eared pages furled at the corners. Along the top cover in blocky text, the title Corpus Juris Civilis, Vol. I: Codex Justinianus stands prominent, the subheading in smaller text beneath the larger text above it. Tucked low on the bottom of the cover, the words Flavius Petrus Sabbatius Justinianus can be seen in smaller block text embossing, both the author and title of the volume mirrored in considerably smaller text along the well worn spine.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:fr:frederic", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Palace:Citadel:ThirdFloor:Virtual:DignitarySitting01]#36041", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Mar 3 12:44): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1646329481", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1646329481", "TimeClosed":"1646329481", "TimeFiled":"1645979467" ])

Frederic's embossed rich brown leather book:\<[Allegory:Props:Writing:Books:FabricBook]#290394\> -\> Crafted from supple leather binding, this volume displays a simple, striking image of a tri-pointed shield at the center of the cover, the words De insigniis et armis and Bartolo da Sassoferrato embossed above and below in center justified block text, the raised curvature of the words darkened by use and age. The spine is similarly embossed with a smaller version of the shield emblem, remnants of bronze highlighting long since rubbed away by frequent handling.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:fr:frederic", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Palace:Citadel:ThirdFloor:Virtual:DignitarySitting01]#36041", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Mar 3 12:44): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1646329481", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1646329481", "TimeClosed":"1646329481", "TimeFiled":"1645979742" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBOSSING ! Frederic's embossed blue-grey leather book:\<[Allegory:Props:Writing:Books:FabricBook]#283662\> -\> Bound in supple blue-grey leather that shows darkening at the edges from age and regular use, this large volume prominently displays a man's silhouette in profile, the high ridge of the nose and the strong line of the jaw worn smooth where they curve from the cover of the book. The words Il Principe run the width of the top of the cover in capital letters, the text Niccolo di Bernardo dei Machiavelli embossed in a smaller, similar font along the span of the lower portion. The spine of the volume displays the words Il Principe and Machiavelli in minuscule block text, the supple sweep of leather otherwise left unadorned.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:fr:frederic", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Palace:Citadel:ThirdFloor:Virtual:DignitarySitting01]#36041", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Mar 3 12:44): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1646329471", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1646329471", "TimeClosed":"1646329471", "TimeFiled":"1645980397" ])

Frederic's embossed pearly white leather book:\<[Allegory:Props:Writing:Books:FabricBook]#293879\> -\> Delicately adorned with soft strokes of pale pearl against the pearly white leather binding of the book, the word Decameron sweeps across the top portion of the cover in swirling, elaborate cursive text. At the base, a silhouette of ten figures in single file profile decorates the horizon line embossed upon the leather, the space beneath this simple motif detailed with the words Giovanni Boccaccio in a simpler version of the elaborate cursive above. Lidia's pair of engraved sapphire-accented borealis blue fire opal and pristine silver drop earrings:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Earrings:DropEarrings]#52959\> -\> Delicate, yet with a hint of opulence in the variety of airy stone composition, these earrings boast a rainfall silhouette beset with circular borealis blue fire opal cabochons, and round brilliant crystalline blue sapphires. Strewn vertically into twin linear trickles along a duo of fine, dangling pristine silver strands of chain, the double-row of smaller blue sapphire gems subtly disperse from the main settings to reveal larger borealis blue fire opal spotlight stones that dangle at varying lengths, each cascading drop dazzling with the series of stones in pairs and singulars along the length of silver links. Haloed in sleek bezel settings of pristine silver, each movement glimmers with either the shimmer of light on their multitude of facets upon the sapphires, or rainbow play of color beneath the opals' opaque polished surfaces, lending either earring's duo of delicate mirror chains a mystical quality from each varicolored dewdrop stone.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Mar 3 12:44): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1646329472", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1646329472", "TimeClosed":"1646329472", "TimeFiled":"1646176973" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"So. I have been pondering, and chewing, and looking into this question before I asked, to make sure that it was something appropriate for her career before I made an ass out of myself by quick-firing questions. :p From the sound of it, enameling is based on utilizing quartz, glass, (the previous two often dyed) gemstones which have been ground into a fine powder, and metals which are fused together with high heat.... If I send in gems, like maybe handfuls or whatever I'm going to use and the use of a dye if I wanna go full cray (which we all know that I often do, because this is me we're talking about here), can I do this in descriptions??? Would you be interested in maybe eventually adding this to jewelry??? Or even other items that can be enameled like vases, other metalwork, and whatever else you can think of?", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:hi:hilarion", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Hilarion (Mar 2 20:18): Computer says no.\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"new", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1646270287", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1646270287", "TimeClosed":"1646270287", "TimeFiled":"1646264512" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's embroidered auroral azure taffeta sleeveless doublet:\<[Allegory:Props:Clothing:Doublets:Sleeveless]#245606\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of soft pearl silk thread -\> Following the slanted stitches and line of lustrous silver buttons that run down the front of the garment, intricately embroidered wildflowers cascade over the lustered shimmer of the taffeta silk, the auroral azure color complemented by shades of blue and purple with vibrant contrast found in the soft pearl silk threading and glossy yellow blossoms tucked throughout the haphazard bouquet. The broadest span of the shoulders from the flared half-cap to the straight collar is accentuated by leggy pheasant's eye narcissi blooms, their star-like trumpet flowers clustered around the papery, partially unfurled petals of the lavender blue pasque flowers, the stems of these flora disappearing amongst the cascading waterfall of brilliant white snow-in-summer blossoms and cornflower blue flax that follows the tapered lines of the narrowed waist. On the reverse, the broad panel that blankets the shoulder blades is awash in shades of white and yellow, the splash of contrasting color bright against the auroral azure fabric. White rock rose blossoms with goldenrod yellow centers tangle with glossy yellow buttercups, the patternless array of spindly stalks creating a web reminiscent of lace across the span of the upper torso.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996430", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996430", "TimeClosed":"1647996430", "TimeFiled":"1646667045" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's pair of embroidered auroral azure taffeta slashed trunk hose:\<[Allegory:Props:Clothing:Pants:TrunkHoseSlashed]#248539\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of soft pearl silk thread -\> Each pane of the trunk hose has been embroidered with a meandering trail of delicate wildflower blossoms in soft pearl silk thread complemented by pale cornflower and rich royal blue, the cascading tumble of trumpet gentians, crepe-like flax, and delicate pearl white meadow saxifrage contrasting against the almost pearlescent luster of the auroral azure taffeta fabric. The dove grey lining visible between the slashed panels of the trunk hose has been sporadically adorned with an occasional stalk of grape hyacinth, the pillowed inky blue blossoms revealed as the bombasted garment shifts with the wearer's movement.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996430", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996430", "TimeClosed":"1647996430", "TimeFiled":"1646667284" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's sable fur-trimmed embroidered cinder smoke melton hooded cape:\<[Allegory:Props:Clothing:Cloaks:CapeHooded]#15659\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of azure silk thread -\> The ankle-length hem of the hooded cape has been adorned with a patternless sweep of embroidered wildflowers, azure silk thread detailing the plush petals of trumpet gentians amid a blanket of pale cornflower flax blossoms, their fray-edged petals nestled amongst the delicate pale purple blooms of rock soapwort. Contrasting against the cinder smoke woolen fabric and complementing the shimmer of the auroral azure lining found on the reverse, this meadow of embroidered flora lends the garment additional weight and structure through a network of lace-like stalks that hold the broad hem flared around the legs of the wearer.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996430", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996430", "TimeClosed":"1647996430", "TimeFiled":"1646668619" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's embroidered opalescent blushed pearl taffeta back-laced gown:\<[Allegory:Props:Clothing:Gowns:BackLaced]#298077\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of misty rose silk thread -\> The lustrous shimmer of the opalescent blushed pearl taffeta fabric has been heavily adorned in floral embroidery, tumbles of delicate misty rose silk thread blossoms mingling with soft pearl petals from top to bottom. The square neckline of the gown is wreathed in meadow saxifrage and rock soapwort, the waterfall of blossoms narrowing at the tapered V at the waist before fanning out in a sparse, patternless cascade of minuscule flowers and papery sheer petals to cover the flared fullness of the skirts. Along the back of the gown, the delicate stalks of the blossoms weave in and out around the spirally laced eyelets before once more fanning out to mingle with the embroidered pattern of simple wildflowers that adorns the front of the gown's knife pleated skirt.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996430", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996430", "TimeClosed":"1647996430", "TimeFiled":"1646671022" ])

Percival's reticella lace-trimmed embroidered soft ivory rose sheer silk fan:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Misc:Items:HandFan]#305559\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of misty rose silk thread -\> Misty rose silk thread complements soft pearl in a lush embroidery of delicate blossoms arranged in a loose bouquet across the face of the sheer silk fan. Soft pearl reticella lace trim along the semicircular perimeter has been carefully gathered in places to create a shape evocative of trumpet flowers, the embroidered stalks of these accents lost to a prolific blanket of delicate snow-in-summer blossoms and tiny misty rose rock soapwort, the carefree wildflowers tangled together in a haphazard array that covers the sheer swath of delicate silk.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996430", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996430", "TimeClosed":"1647996430", "TimeFiled":"1646671500" ])

Soft pearl reticella lace trim along the perimeter has been carefully gathered in places to create a shape evocative of trumpet flowers, the embroidered stalks of these accents gravitating toward the center before being lost to a prolific blanket of delicate snow-in-summer blossoms and tiny misty rose rock soapwort, the carefree wildflowers tangled together in a haphazard array that covers the sheer swath of delicate silk. ([ "Account":"robertg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of A Glowing Courtyard. Front and center, a big crane readies for flight. The crane is all white, rock even. Below is a light yellowy fountain full of blue water that reflects some yellow and red from the sky.\\r\\nThe sky is red and orange and the clouds are a darker purple and blue on the upper side. Under the sunset sky is a bright red pattern of terra-cotta with some shadow. A skinny black dog sits by the iron-barred door. Shaded by a cream awning, the woman relaxes and sips her drink, covering the green chair with her long brown hair.\\r\\nOn the right side of the painting, plants grow and vines tower toward the sky. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Artist:Canvas]#175452\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:le:lee", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:SpanishEstate:SecondFloor:LivingRoom", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996431", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996431", "TimeClosed":"1647996431", "TimeFiled":"1646698001" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Toddia's engraved emerald-accented dewdrop green diamond and foliate sterling silver archaic ring:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Rings:Archaic]#156145\> -\> Worked into the form of a vaulted, tapered lozenge reminiscent of the universal shape of an elongated four-pointed compass star, with arciform edges tapering to rounded points, this finger-sleeve ring boasts an openwork gallery allowing any available light to shine beneath the raised bridgework, making the gemstone appear as if lit from within. Set within a surround of foliate fretwork, the central dewdrop green diamond has been cut into a navette shape, an lengthened version of the marquise and is framed with fine granules of sterling silver in the form of milgrain beadwork. \\r\\n Oblique slopes cant from the high central setting, pierced throughout their foliage-chased sides with fretworked leaves, which encapsulate minuscule brilliant emeralds within their risen edging. Fluted floral fretwork, whose petals are outlined in the smallest of milgrain granules, lend the ring's shoulders glimmering flair, which crest from miniature leafy sepals where shoulders join a slim band.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:toddia", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southwest:EnglishEstate:SecondFloor:Virtual:GentryBedroom]#145821", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996432", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996431", "TimeClosed":"1647996432", "TimeFiled":"1646721432" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Toddia's engraved cat's eye trapiche emerald and foliate sterling silver bangle:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Bracelet:Bangle]#179001\> -\> The entirety of the bangle is covered in foliate chasework, a method of delicate incisement, wherein the silver is depressed and moulded, with ultrafine, curvatured detail in order to make sections of the metal protrude outward. A display of delicate lobed filigree eclipses the surface of the bangle, boasting shallow, leaf-strewn depressions which coalesce from where a repeat series of ovaline cats-eye trapiche emeralds are surmounted, to end in raised, teardrop lobes at each furling tip. The entirety of the piece has been brushed and oxidized to lend the silver foliage motif shadowy depth.\\r\\n The curvatured band of the bangle has been set with 15 mm ovaline cats-eye trapiche emeralds which have been cut into buff-top cabochons, where the top of each stone is domed, and the overall shape is ovate. The gems themselves exhibit their own natural beauty, boasting a radiating star of inclusions which segment partitions of the stones. Spiring from an emerald pinprick circle at the center, the inclusions subdivide each ovaline cats-eye emerald into six sectors, displaying the gems' inherent optical reflections of chatoyancy in alternating directions, which shimmer through the polished, crystal clear surfaces. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:toddia", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southwest:EnglishEstate:SecondFloor:Virtual:GentryBedroom]#145821", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996432", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996432", "TimeClosed":"1647996432", "TimeFiled":"1646721589" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Toddia's pair of engraved emerald-accented dewdrop green diamond and foliate sterling silver chandelier earrings:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Earrings:ChandelierEarrings]#187032\> -\> Crafted in sterling silver, these earrings are comprised of a crescent moon nested within a larger downturned finial, both of which subtly bow outward from convexly curved edges, and dangle from delicate trace chain strands in a foliate triangle. The tiered framework of each earring, created by chain and crescents both, harbor single teardrop settings in silver at the center, boasting dewdrop green diamonds which dangle from small rava beadworked bail hoops.\\r\\n Moulded one within the other, the crescent and finial tiers bear a smattering of tiny brilliant green emeralds bound within foliate chasework, a method of delicate incisement, wherein the silver is depressed and moulded, with ultrafine, curvatured detail in order to make sections of the metal protrude outward. A display of delicate lobed filigree eclipses the surface of the swooped tiers, boasting shallow, leaf-strewn depressions which coalesce from where central, milgrain-haloed green diamonds are surmounted, to end in raised, teardrop lobes at each furling tip. \\r\\n Clusters of flattened silver rounds, crafted to take the appearance of thin medallions, dangle from the lowest recurved finial tier, accentuating the rhythmic aspects of movement with their tinny jingles.The entirety of the pieces have been brushed and oxidized to lend the silver foliage motif shadowy depth.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:toddia", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southwest:EnglishEstate:SecondFloor:Virtual:GentryBedroom]#145821", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996432", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996432", "TimeClosed":"1647996432", "TimeFiled":"1646721743" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Toddia's engraved emerald-accented dewdrop green diamond and foliate sterling silver hinged bangle:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Bracelet:HingedBangle]#177033\> -\> Altered to appear as more of a cuff than a bangle in shape and size, this wrist adornment boasts a swooping silhouette with steep dips and rises similar to a filigreed wave, which spans the over the wearer's wrist from the back of the hand. Boasting a network of lace-like fretwork between foliate chasing, cutout sprays furl outward, inturning back upon themselves at the tip to form arrays of bowed, hollow leaf-vein tracery beset with silver granules of milgrain beadwork along each fragile filament. Surmounted at the center, concentric floral rings of chasing have been inset with a large, ovaline dewdrop green diamond, surrounded by smaller marquise petals set with brilliant green emeralds, creating a floriated central motif against the backdrop of sterling silver foliage.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:toddia", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southwest:EnglishEstate:SecondFloor:Virtual:GentryBedroom]#145821", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996432", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996432", "TimeClosed":"1647996432", "TimeFiled":"1646721835" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Toddia's engraved dewdrop green diamond and foliate sterling silver locket:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Containers:Locket]#180438\> -\> Enwrapped on either side with feathery fern spears, the center portion of this oval locket boasts a large dewdrop green diamond with a surround of tightly spiraled fiddleheads, delicate, tightly coiled fledgling fern fronds, beset throughout their fragile sproutlet coils with minuscule glimmers of brilliant green emerald. The central setting of this locket boasts a 20 mm dewdrop green diamond at the center, which has been cut into a brilliantly faceted ovaline shape with a crystal clear crown at the top, allowing the multitude of shimmer-enhancing cuts into the gem's culet to shine through. Encapsulating the main stone is a dainty, foliate collet setting in sterling silver, the hollowed curvature of bowed leaves rising from the base in a repetition of decorative overlays, which come to a halt just beneath each facet. Leaf-frilled spiral fiddleheads, boasting tightly tucked lacework filigree leaves within each furled coil, inturn atop smooth stems and whorl over the main stone on either side, their feathery leaflets sporadically set with tiny emeralds, as if speckled with so many dewdrops. \\r\\n This elaborate locket hangs upon a delicate configuration of interbraided silver chain, repetitions of four v-shaped links woven together to create a strand pattern that mirrors a wheat stalk's intricate design.\\r\\n The back has been decorated with wispy foliate designs reminiscent of the leafy detritus of the forest floor, boasting a calligraphic inscription which reads '~ Finnigan Leander Jakobi ~' above a date reading 'November 6th 1601'.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:toddia", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southwest:EnglishEstate:SecondFloor:Virtual:GentryBedroom]#145821", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996432", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996432", "TimeClosed":"1647996432", "TimeFiled":"1646721974" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Toddia's engraved dewdrop green diamond and foliate sterling silver medallion belt:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Belts:Medallion]#53428\> -\> A single double-sided medallion serves as an anchor to the chain extension at one hip, fastening with a hook clasp for the perfect fit.\\r\\n Each broad, ovate medallion is covered in foliate chasework, a method of delicate incisement, wherein the silver is depressed and moulded, with ultrafine, curvatured detail in order to make sections of the metal protrude outward. A display of delicate lobed filigree eclipses the surface of the medallions, boasting shallow, leaf-strewn depressions which coalesce from where central, milgrain-haloed green diamonds are surmounted, to end in raised, teardrop lobes at each furling tip. The entirety of the piece has been brushed and oxidized to lend the silver foliage motif shadowy depth.\\r\\n The medallions have been set with 30 mm buff-top ovaline dewdrop green diamonds which have been cut into buff-top cabochons, where the top of each stone is domed, and the pavilions around the edging are faceted. The gems themselves have been enhanced with a prismatic display of cuts into the underside, or culet of the gemstone, which shine through the polished, crystal clear surface in an array of shimmering brilliance.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:toddia", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southwest:EnglishEstate:SecondFloor:Virtual:GentryBedroom]#145821", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996433", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996432", "TimeClosed":"1647996433", "TimeFiled":"1646722102" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Lidia's engraved opalescent white gold livery collar:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Necklace:LiveryCollar]#269711\> -\> A conch shell representing the Vigliotti family name is nested within a heraldic wreath of olive and oak branches that adorns the perimeter of the circular pendant at the base of the chain of office. Bold serif lettering engraved in beveled relief has been tucked within this dense foliate wreath, the combination of lance-shaped and sinuate leaves cushioning the word 'Fidelitas' where it curves over the top and 'Securitas' which arcs in mirror along the bottom.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996433", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996433", "TimeClosed":"1647996433", "TimeFiled":"1646723348" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' unlit engraved copper chandelier:\<[Allegory:Props:Lighting:Chandelier]#56957\> -\> Crafted in the form of delicate fern spears that have been wrought to take the shape of a bulbous finial with a pointed top, this fragile chandelier boasts numerous candle holders ensconced within the leaves at its hollow center and is attached to a strand of chain links, enabling the piece to dangle from the ceiling.\\r\\nComprised of three broad, paper-fine copper fronds, the leaf stalks and tiny leaflet blades curl outward to form a bulbous base before arching into to a fine point at the top. The petioles branch in a gibbous surround of stems, creating a frame of wispy openwork tracery between the narrow, elongated blades upon each frond. Each frond flaunts paper-thin wafer beads of gold-flecked verdigris glass within the network of hollows, lending an ethereal element to the otherwise rosy metallic pendant finial. The minuscule spears upon the stems add a lace-like texture while the light reflects against the translucent beads and peeks through the branch-like frame, casting prismatic nature-patterned silhouettes upon the ceiling.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Outlands:Settlements:Northwest:Smithy", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996433", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996433", "TimeClosed":"1647996433", "TimeFiled":"1646838922" ])

Frederic's embossed blue-grey leather book:\<[Allegory:Props:Writing:Books:FabricBook]#162484\> -\> Bound in supple blue-grey leather that shows darkening at the edges from age and regular use, this large volume prominently displays a man's silhouette in profile, the high ridge of the nose and the strong line of the jaw worn smooth where they curve from the cover of the book. The words Il Principe, Vol. II run the width of the top of the cover in capital letters, the text Niccolo di Bernardo dei Machiavelli embossed in a smaller, similar font along the span of the lower portion. The spine of the volume displays the words Il Principe, Vol. II and Machiavelli in minuscule block text, the supple sweep of leather otherwise left unadorned.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:fr:frederic", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Palace:Citadel:ThirdFloor:MeetingRoom", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996433", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996433", "TimeClosed":"1647996433", "TimeFiled":"1646840700" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's pair of sparkling embroidered roseate sage sheer silk tapered sleeves:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Clothing:Accessories:Sleeves:TaperedSleeves]#193372\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of coral cotton thread -\> Hues of coral, bronze, garnet, and scarlet play over the surface of the fitted sheer silk sleeves in an elaborate embroidery of forest flora. Garnet jack-in-the-pulpit flowers, with their pitcher bases and hooded petal coverings, rest among a tumble of scarlet thistle blossoms and coral lady's slipper blooms, the cotton thread matte against the luster of the sheer roseate sage silken fabric beneath. Accentuating this wash of warm red hues, bronze trillium with their delicate petals contrast against vibrant white bloodroot, their five-petaled flower heads adorned with sparkling copper paillettes that shimmer and shine with the movement of the wearer. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996435", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996435", "TimeClosed":"1647996435", "TimeFiled":"1647269443" ])

Prodigiously petaled thistle blooms in scarlet complement the delicate trillium blossoms found throughout, bright white bloodroot blooms decorated with sparkling copper paillettes at their centers to lend the drape of the sash added weight and substance. Throughout this tangle of flowers, jack-in-the-pulpit blooms peek from within the bed of red-hued flora, the depths of their pitcher bases shaded with heavy stitchery to give an added sense of dimension.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996435", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996435", "TimeClosed":"1647996435", "TimeFiled":"1647269580" ])

Delicate bronze trillium tempers the warmth of the scarlet thistle and coral colored jack-in-the-pulpit, with brilliant splashes of coral found in the lady-s slipper blossoms that sporadically dot the fabric. A simple pencil hem trims the piece in coral cotton, the matte luster of the stitches complementing the shiny luster of the silken fabric beneath.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996435", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996435", "TimeClosed":"1647996435", "TimeFiled":"1647269679" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"I was curious I could get the brief changed on two items. Her earrings, first and foremost from what they are now to just 'engraved, dewdrop green diamond and foliate sterling silver tiered chandelier earrings' (essentially taking out 'emerald-accented' and adding 'tiered') and then her archaic ring the same thing, taking out the 'emerald-accented' and adding 'elongated' before archaic ring brief to read 'engraved, dewdrop green diamond and foliate sterling silver elongated archaic ring'? (christ, these are a mouthful) If not, it's cool. I'd -like- to get rid of 'engraved' on both to shorten it, but if not that's okay, too... ([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' engraved lustrous bronze bases:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Armorsmith:Plate:Torso:Bases]#297406\> -\> Bearing a general resemblance to a skirt, this knee-length armor is forged from dozens upon dozens of smaller squares of lustrous bronze riveted together at the corners to create two larger pieces which are joined down one side by a series of hinges with a matching number of latches down the opposite. Alternating from square to square and row by row, a miniature circular mandala of fan-like palm fronds has been engraved upon half of the small plates, decorating the bases in an overall checkerboard pattern.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:Tavern:SecondFloor:Room01]#38382", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996437", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996437", "TimeClosed":"1647996437", "TimeFiled":"1647616638" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' pair of engraved lustrous bronze spaulders:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Armorsmith:Plate:Arms:Spaulders]#208104\> -\> Crafted from a series of five overlapping, curved plates of bronze to hug the shoulder and permit full articulation of the uppermost joint of the arm, the convex cap of either spaulder has been engraved with a mandala comprised of eight identical palmettes arranged in a repeating whorl of foliage, the fan-like array forming an intricate design in relief upon the lustrous metal surface.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:Tavern:SecondFloor:Room01]#38382", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996437", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996437", "TimeClosed":"1647996437", "TimeFiled":"1647617263" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' engraved lustrous bronze breastplate:\<[Ironclaw:Props:Armorsmith:Plate:Torso:Breastplate]#312805\> -\> Forged from a single piece of bronze to hug the form of the female figure, this breastplate is divided visually from waist to shoulder by a series of eight alternating panels, four left bare and four engraved, which appear to radiate from the centermost point over the abdomen. A seemingly innumerable arrangement of overlapping palmette mandalas fills the tapered span of the latter four decorative panels, the etched design an intricate tangle of foliage in contrast to the otherwise lustrous surface of the metal.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:Tavern:SecondFloor:Room01]#38382", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996438", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996437", "TimeClosed":"1647996438", "TimeFiled":"1647618206" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Polgara's engraved black ironwood longbow:\<[Allegory:Props:Weapons:Ranged:Medium:Bow]#218893\> -\> Crafted in such a way that the limbs, or staves at either are faintly swooped, this bow boasts a subtly recurved frame, and a heavily decorated riser which features a notched arrow rest, sight window, and textured grip. The high grip is created so that the wielder must lift the heel of the hand, straightening the wrist for the draw, and has been shallowly incised with an ultrafine checkered pattern which provides a secure grasp in wet weather, or with a glove. The entirety of the piece has been crafted from contrasting deep shades of exotic hardwood, resulting in a steady draw.\\r\\n Either side of the of the grip upon the riser has been inset with a muraled intarsia inlay of a coniferous timberland, bestrewn with a staggered rangale of deer scattered amidst hearty clusters of ferns. An intricate display utilizing light and dark grains of ironwood set flush into the smoothly polished surface of the riser, depict a forestry scene of fine-limbed cervids in various natural stances. A majestic antlered stag poses at the fore of the herd, head risen as if frozen in the act of calling his bugle into the distance, the bucks at his side standing at attention. A pale, central flare of contrasting inlay streaks through the center of the herd toward the grip, evergreen trees filling the background, to lend the impression of a heavily timbered woodland. Creative joinery, hewn and carved into the shape of narrow, stylized antlers, attach a pair of faintly recurved limbs in a subtly lighter shade than the riser. The beams of horn fork upon either side, smoothly transitioning from the central support in the same flush vein of inset inlays as the riser itself. Contrasting the lighter shade of the limbs, the antlers crag and furl in a darker hue along the curvature of the appendages, in a many-tined display of branches which reach along the outer curve without compromising the functionality of the weapon itself.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Carpenter:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Mar 22 20:47): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1647996438", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1647996438", "TimeClosed":"1647996438", "TimeFiled":"1647720678" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"The account \\"darkspun\\" has been suspended; Reason: As per the ToS and the long-standing rules of both IcO and AoE, revealing the current or former staff identity of PC characters is something we have a zero tolerance policy on. This combined with your consistent patterns of alt abuse, toxic negativity, conspiracy theories, and the frequency with which you disparage your fellow community members past and present has resulted in a pattern of behavior we will no longer tolerate or welcome here. As is standard procedure, I will prorate and refund your PayPal account for the remaining time you have paid. This indefinite banning of your account is effective immediately. ([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' engraved lustrous bronze single-bladed battle axe:\<[Allegory:Props:Weapons:Axes:Medium:SingleBladedBattleAxe]#285608\> -\> Radiating from the juncture of the weapon's haft and arcing blade is a subtle yet intricate array of foliage, the engraved palmette sweeping across the entirety of the lustrous bronze surface towards the sharply beveled edge. Executed in mirror upon either side of the blade, the inlaid design of minuscule grooves functions to strategically direct fluids and other detritus away from the well-honed point.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:Tavern:SecondFloor:Room01]#38382", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 16 19:58): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1650153483", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1650153483", "TimeClosed":"1650153483", "TimeFiled":"1648731400" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' engraved lustrous bronze buckler:\<[Allegory:Props:Weapons:Shields:Metal:Buckler]#269782\> -\> Approximately fifteen inches in diameter, this single piece of bronze is forged with a small convex dome at its center behind which the wielder's hand is safeguarded. A series of eight alternating panels intersect at the middle of the piece, tapering wider as they radiate outward towards the edges of the shield. Of these panels, four have been left bare to showcase the lustrousness of the metal, while the remaining four have been decorated with a seemingly innumerable arrangement of overlapping palmette mandalas, the engraved design an intricate tangle of foliage in contrast to the simplicity of the alternating panels.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:Tavern:SecondFloor:Room01]#38382", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 16 19:58): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1650153483", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1650153483", "TimeClosed":"1650153483", "TimeFiled":"1648731982" ])

([ "Account":"pollyg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"Heeeeeeey - I have a list! :/ --- NICKNAME - Rique -- GAIT - 'sedately saunters' -- SCAR -- 'scar-spliced' left eyebrow (The tapered end of this brow is separated by a vertical slice.) -- SCENT - a woodsy aroma enlivened by crisp green notes of bergamot with hints of sun-warmed leather and cigar smoke -- TATTOO (throat) - A miniature marquetry crucifix, heavily redolent with foliate leafwork has been inked upon the skin over the jugular vein. -- TATTOO (chest) -- A meticulously shaded heart shape resides at the center of this tattoo over the left pectoral, the top curvature licked by ink-depicted flames, and the entirety encircled with gnarled thorns. A trio of rose blossoms decorate the breadth of the thorned vines, their petals dripping ruby droplets. An aura of rays radiate from the behind the central heart, surrounding the piece in a corona of heavenly light. -- TATTOO (back) - Housed within an oval wreath of lush roses, this vibrantly inked tattoo of the Virgin Mary is awash in a rainbow of colors that highlight the sacred imagery, which covers the majority of the back. Hands clasped in prayer with a serene expression, Mary's form is draped in a pale blue veil adorned with golden stars representative of the heavens above, her pale rose dress complementing the vivid crimson of the rose petals that encircle the motif. Filling the background, rays of golden light emanate outward to fill the oval with an aura of light behind the blessed Virgin's iconic form.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:en:enrique", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:Tavern:SecondFloor:Room01]#243300", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 6 00:28): You've successfully taken 240 StoryPoints from the account \\"pollyg\\" because: \\"Nickname (10); scent (40); gait (30); scar (40); tattoo (3 x 40) for Enrique (April sale price) ~Tops\\".\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"stp", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1649219311", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1649219310", "TimeClosed":"1649219311", "TimeFiled":"1649185066" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Idris' engraved wrought iron table:\<[Allegory:Props:Furniture:Tables:Table]#154358\> -\> Delicate and airy in its composition of openwork ornamental design, the wrought iron itself lends a certain masculinity in its solidity. The two create a culminating marriage of feminine and masculine which offers an air of exquisite refinery in their pairing. An unfurling spiral of wrought iron decorates the center of the table, which begins with a tight coil and gradually broadens outward into an ever-widening arc until it reaches one long edge of the tabletop. Four legs support the table from below, curving inward from each of the four corners to meet at a central series of convoluted curlicues before bowing into elegantly outswept feet.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:id:idris", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 16 19:58): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1650153484", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1650153484", "TimeClosed":"1650153484", "TimeFiled":"1649773848" ])

Saint Anne, the patroness of mothers, mothers-to-be, wives, grandmothers, and teachers, is the beloved mother of the Virgin Mary and the grandmother of Jesus. This statue, chiseled and polished smooth, displays her serene figure in pure white marble, her hands clasped before her in prayer as a tender smile softens her features. The flowing robes of her veil and dress pool around her feet, the stone carefully carved in a seamless fashion that gives the impression of realistic draping over her life-size form. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#292943\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northwest:Cathedral:Nave", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 16 19:58): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1650153484", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1650153484", "TimeClosed":"1650153484", "TimeFiled":"1649831125" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! SCULPTURE ! sculpture of Saint Joseph. Saint Joseph, the patron saint of families, fathers, travelers, immigrants, and the working class, is the husband of the Virgin Mary and the earthly father of Jesus. This life-size statue in pure white marble features his robed form cradling the baby Jesus to his chest in one arm, a staff adorned with lily flowers held upright in his other hand. His bearded face smiles down at the child held close, the locks of his hair and the draping folds teased into life-like detail from the stone. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#78151\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northwest:Cathedral:Nave", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 16 19:58): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1650153484", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1650153484", "TimeClosed":"1650153484", "TimeFiled":"1649831903" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! SCULPTURE ! sculpture of Saint Benedict. Saint Benedict, the patron saint of monks, religious order, students, and against illness and disease, is depicted wearing a Benedictine cowl and carrying a crosier, his stern expression chiseled and polished smooth beneath the realistic drape of the deep hood of his flowing robes. Life-size, this representation of the figure stands within the niche, his free hand frozen as if making the sign of the cross before his frame. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#283010\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northwest:Cathedral:Nave", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 16 19:58): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1650153484", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1650153484", "TimeClosed":"1650153484", "TimeFiled":"1649832545" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! SCULPTURE ! sculpture of Saint Dominic. Saint Dominic, the patron saint of astronomers, scientists, and the falsely accused, is depicted in life-size realism wearing a Dominican habit with an open book in one hand and a rosary in the other. The folds of the long hooded cape drape over his head and down his frame to pool at his feet, his expression contemplative as he gazes skyward from within the niche that houses the statue. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#300742\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northwest:Cathedral:Nave", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Apr 16 19:58): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1650153485", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1650153484", "TimeClosed":"1650153485", "TimeFiled":"1649833235" ])
