([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Abraham's engraved black alabaster fountain:\<[IronClaw:Props:Miscellaneous:Fountain]#282253\> -\> The larger bottom basin has been elaborately carved to resemble natural stacked river stones, each one of the individual stones unique in size and shape but neatly fitting together like a puzzle. Tiny stippled textures and small lichens have been carved along the curvature of the stones to add additional realism to the pieces. The top basin is considerably smaller and shaped like a crown which has been set atop the head of a peacock, his frame standing tall and proud as the fan of his elaborate tail acts as an umbrella to shelter his partner and two small chicks from the cascading waters that continuously flow over the details of the fountain. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:ab:abraham", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Stonemason:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962052", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962052", "TimeClosed":"1686962052", "TimeFiled":"1650499317" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Abraham's engraved burnished gold blackthorn folding screen:\<[IronClaw:Props:Furniture:Misc:FoldingScreen]#112650\> -\> Each frame of the trifold screen has been carved with minuscule detail to portray a scene reminiscent of a palace, small embrasure style windows allowing scant glimpses through to what lies beyond. Pennants adorn the top of the screen, their triangular shapes held aloft in an invisible wind at the top of the parapets. The bottom of the centermost screen has been carved into a tiny draw bridge, making the entire piece into a miniature palace facade.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:ab:abraham", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Stonemason:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962052", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962052", "TimeClosed":"1686962052", "TimeFiled":"1650499967" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! SCULPTURE ! sculpture of a massive, polished dioramic egg. Reaching a height of six feet, and a width of three at its broadest point, this sizable piece appears rather unpretentious aside from its polished sheen and cloud-riddled blue coloration. Upon the outer surface very little can be seen aside from various pricks, divots, and small pinpricks near the egg's base. A single, florin sized hole just where the egg begins to broaden seems to be the only decoration upon the oblong's outer surface.\\r\\n\\r\\n Seen through a small peephole on the side of the egg, from an overlooking vantage point, the immense view below takes shape in the form of finely chiseled stone which depicts a three-dimensional, fantasmic worldscape set within a rough stone cavern. The area is lit strategically by way of an arrangement of holes bored through the domed top, which create a series of illuminating rays shining down upon the scene. \\r\\n\\r\\n Columns of rough stone jut from the furthest reaches within the dome, creating a steep cliffside from which a cascading waterfall plunges over the highest ridge and into an overlit pool of wavelets. Upon the highest summit, the silhouette of a dainty white unicorn leans to quench its thirst from the water above, while a minuscule mermaid perches near the pool, tail draping in the water, fingers combing the locks draped over one shoulder.\\r\\n\\r\\n Giant in comparison to the rest of the scene, stalagmites stretch down to the cavern's floor to connect to stalagmites that stretch up. Small peephole turrets of dwellings lit from behind, fill each and every one, like sparkling snow against the cloudy blue alabaster, while separate stone buildings have been carved into the surrounding rock walls. Below, an expanse of shaded city streets twist around the rising rocks, translucent alabaster smoke columns appearing to puff from chimneys. Tiny pinpricks in the egg's outer shell shine throughout the cavern, muted by way of fine pieces of translucent alabaster creating a starry effect to the ceiling of the cloaked world.\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n A central beam of light from the apex of the egg shines down through the cavernous scene to illuminate a many spired, translucent white castle rising from the center of the stone masterpiece, residing within a surround of faceted blue alabaster crystal clusters. The ethereal scene is lit from above by various beams of light angling over the crystalline windows and terminated planes, highlighting the meticulously carved details of each spire and crystal.\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\nBas relief nooks and crannies create recesses along either side of the cliffside near the fall, filled with white weeping willows, their stringy boughs pricked here and there throughout their length, giving the trees the appearance of being strewn with a multitude of fireflies.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe entire creation sits atop a crown shaped pedestal with curlicue points of the same material. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#290427\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Roads:StradaLavorante:01", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962052", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962052", "TimeClosed":"1686962052", "TimeFiled":"1650763814" ])

([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBROIDERY ! Percival's silvered sapphirine angora tapestry:\<[Ironclaw:Staff:Cersei:Props:Clothing:TapestryBlank]#295668\>, THREAD:Percival's spool of butterscotch gold satin thread -\> The surface of the woven tapestry is covered in a network of gold satin thread detailing various celestial bodies and constellations, the stars of each cluster adorned with glittering gold paillettes that catch the light and contrast against the silver hue of the background. An elaborate border of embroidered braids surrounds the piece, the filigree pattern that fills the space mirrored in the yin yang sun and moon found at the center. On the right, the rays of the sun radiate outward in curling flames while the crescent moon hugging the curvature of the left side of the golden medallion is surrounded by smaller stitches evocative of an aura of glowing light. Finishing the piece, a trim of gold fringe creates a textural detail that complements the smooth luster of the angora material.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:pe:percival", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Tailors:FirstFloor:Back", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962052", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962052", "TimeClosed":"1686962052", "TimeFiled":"1650832365" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Toddia's engraved ruby-accented dark shadowy silver wide-band circlet:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Circlets:Wide-band]#50052\> -\> The inside of the crown’s band is rounded and smooth to rest comfortably against the wearer’s head. ([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! SCULPTURE ! sculpture of a well toned, nude man. This statue of a well toned, nude man has been carved into a relaxed pose resting on a chaise. A bearskin rug has been chiseled between the man and the chaise. Well defined features have been sculpted over his body giving the anatomy a toned, muscular appearance. He has one leg propped up on the chase with his right knee bent and right foot resting on the cushion while the left leg is draped over the side of the chase. His left arm is resting beside him holding a lily while his right arm is raised behind his head. His fingers are combing through this short hair which is clean, and neat in appearance. The face of this statue has finer details of almond shaped eyes and smirking lips with a goatee His chest has the etching of a tattoo which bears an oak and olive branches crossing over his heart. A five pointed star is placed in the middle of the branches. At the bottom of the statue you see the words ‘Italy in the form of man’ inscribed boldly. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#289886\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:is:isabelle", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:SpanishEstate:Basement:Virtual:StaffBedroom]#284741", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962052", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962052", "TimeClosed":"1686962052", "TimeFiled":"1650842326" ])

([ "Account":"ezralee", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of the city of Rinascita. Multiple layers of minute brushstrokes cover the surface of the canvas in a contrasting play of deep blues and greys alongside bright yellows and golds, the network of the city streets of Rinascita sprawling as seen from above. Illuminated by lamplight, the web of roads radiates outward from the well-lit core of the city, the fountain at the center reflecting the aura of light like a glowing beacon in the middle of the city's main plaza. The semicircular cityscape ends where the ocean begins, the grey and gold structures contrasted by the umbral shades of the ocean that reflect the pale yellow light of the moon in shimmering waves. And the bottom left-hand corner, a signature in bright crimson paint reads \\"Dalena\\" in tiny swirling script. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Artist:Canvas]#72059\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:el:elle", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Palace:ItalianEstate:SecondFloor:Virtual:GentryBedroom]#77034", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962052", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962052", "TimeClosed":"1686962052", "TimeFiled":"1650844701" ])

([ "Account":"robertg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of night. A black sky is covered in tiny sharp dots and diamonds of stars. Rectangles at the bottom block the stars forming a dark silhouette of townhouses and buildings. In the foreground, a hooded figure sits on a bench. Some of her long hair flows out of her dark red hooded cape. One side of her is highlighted with some yellow from nearby lights while the other has many dark shadows. Her nose, chin and hint of an amused smile shows from the shadows of her hood. A few of the brightest stars form an ’S’ shape. Some misty clouds blur some of the stars. One area of the clouds even seems to form a jaw and the moon an eye. If you look closely at the feint shape of the clouds, it even takes the form of an eel. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Artist:Canvas]#305109\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:le:lee", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Plazas:PiazzaVecchia:03", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962052", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962052", "TimeClosed":"1686962052", "TimeFiled":"1650847234" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Lidia's engraved vibrant jade and matte rose gold drop necklace:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Necklace:DropNecklace]#55919\> -\> Soft and dainty in appearance, matte rose gold filaments branch from a central dangle to create a fragile swag of finely wrought leafy floral sprigs draping over the collarbones in a delicate array, and hangs from fine chain. Connecting to the clasp at the back via fine chain, a single bead of jade decorates either side of the throat, terminating the chain portion of this necklace, which then deviates into a network of delicate, foliate branches that come to rest just below the hollow of the throat. Bestrewn with minuscule, veined leaves, the rose gold finework dips into an arc in a series of twigs and leaflets, the center set with a trio of varisized jade spheres protruding from the branch, which act as unopened floral buds.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962053", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962053", "TimeClosed":"1686962053", "TimeFiled":"1651795614" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Lidia's pair of engraved vibrant jade and matte rose gold drop earrings:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Earrings:DropEarrings]#23356\> -\> A wysteria-like, dangling inflorescence of minuscule jade laburnum flowers, otherwise known as a raceme, graces either earring in a culmination of rose gold and vibrant jade. The long, pendulous clusters of miniature vibrant jade pea-flowers reside at the center of either earring, the flowers at the base of the central stem in full bloom, creating a trickle of floral blossoms at the tip which recede into budded balls of jade near the top.The delicate jade florets peek from betwixt a dangling cascade of wafer-thin, spear shaped leaflets in frosty, rose gold at the slightest movement.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:li:lidia", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962053", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962053", "TimeClosed":"1686962053", "TimeFiled":"1651795926" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Polgara's engraved magnolia white spruce folding screen:\<[IronClaw:Props:Furniture:Misc:FoldingScreen]#303968\> -\> Leaf furled pineapple finials cap the furthest corners of the screen, above sprays of broad leaved vines climbing either side panel, whose bodies have been hollowed, and cutout save for the arching veins of the leaves themselves, which lend depth, and dimension to the foliage in their curvatured form. The broadest, central panel of the screen boasts the silhouette of a bird of paradise perched upon a branch, his wings unfurled and his long, filamented tail sweeping down the length of the panel in a sinuous S-shaped curve that betrays a sense of movement.\\r\\n", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Carpenter:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962053", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962053", "TimeClosed":"1686962053", "TimeFiled":"1651798557" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Polgara's magnolia white engraved spruce jewelry box:\<[IronClaw:Props:Furniture:Container:Box:Jewelry]#73319\> -\> A series of translucent alabaster finches inlaid into the pale spruce dance a pattern across the lid of the jewelry box in a flurry of avian activity. Each finch lies flush within the surface of the wood, the portions of stone outlined in fine strips of magnolia white spruce, where it has been recessed into the wood itself, separating wings, and body. Polished to a fine sheen, the lid smoothly converges both stone and fine lumber in a combination of delicacy, in the form of the darker wood grains swirling through the translucent birds, which smoothly transitions into the lustered grain of the spruce. ", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:po:polgara", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Carpenter:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962053", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962053", "TimeClosed":"1686962053", "TimeFiled":"1651799791" ])

([ "Account":"robertg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of one flower among stones. There is a single bright red flower. It is presented by a pile of smooth rocks. Dark grey rocks cover the ground with a few patches of brighter grass. ([ "Account":"sendnoodlez", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! EMBOSSING ! Frederic's embossed ink black cabretta book:\<[Allegory:Props:Writing:Books:FabricBook]#78078\> -\> Supple from regular use, the well-worn cover of this book is embossed with the title \\"Summa Theologica\\" in a bold, blocky text at the top, underneath which the name \\"St. Thomas Aquinas\\" has been written in smaller font. The ridges of the type as well as the book's spine have been brushed with an essence of gold paint that has worn away in spots to reveal the leather binding beneath. A character can have two classes and learn the skills within each class to lvl 24. You can also learn all the general skills to lvl 24. General skills are not restricted by class and are available to all characters. If you are desiring a skill that IS under the umbrella of a specific class, you will have to unlearn one of your two classes (without a refund on the LPs spent). My question was when do baby props turn into toddler props and does that change cost stprypoints??", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:be:beth", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:ApartmentsGioco:FirstFloor:Virtual:SittingRoom]#273953", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Sep 15 13:53): [OOC Page] to [Postalpoppy/Doctor Beth]: \\"Infant props turn into baby props at 1 year old, baby into toddler at 2 years old, toddler into young child at 4, child at 6, adolescent at 10, teenager at 14, and young adult at 18. This does not cost storypoints. If you can remind me of the birthday of the baby, I can adjust the age accordingly. Hope this helps!\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"new", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1663264427", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1663264427", "TimeClosed":"1663264427", "TimeFiled":"1663189616" ])

Thanks :)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:be:beth", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Outlands:Settlements:Central:Virtual:Homestead01:House02]#88129", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ 4739 \}), "Notes":"!TAS! (Sep 26 21:03): Transferred from New to Pregnancy by Topsy.\\n\\nTopsy (Sep 26 21:04): Page added to Beth's pending pages: \\"[Sep 26 21:04] The infant should now be aged up to baby status. In order to proceed with a new pregnancy, I will need to have the father send in an assist saying he consents to this. Thanks!\\n\\nTopsy (Nov 29 22:49): You've successfully taken 200 StoryPoints from the account \\"postalpoppy\\" because: \\"Pregnancy for Beth and Landon ~Tops\\".\\n\\nTopsy (Nov 29 22:54): First mod given Nov 29th\\n\\nTopsy (Dec 31 21:37): Page added to Beth's pending pages: \\"[Dec 31 21:36] I forgot to send this earlier, so here is the schedule of pregnancy mods for Beth, give or take a week or two for each stage after conception: 09/28/22 - conception -- 11/09/22 - symptoms develop -- 11/29/22 - barely visible swell of a -- 01/25/23 - slightly rounded bump of a -- 03/08/23 - noticeably rounded -- 05/17/23 - heavily pregnant -- 06/28/23 - birth\\n\\nTopsy (Jun 16 22:38): Heavily pregnant mod added 6.16\\n\\n\<*\> Topsy (Jul 31 20:42): Page added to Beth's pending pages: \\"[Jul 31 20:41] I've removed the pregnancy stomach mods and delivered the baby. Please assist with the name chosen for the baby. Should you require any modifications, including the gender of the child, please file an assist. Reminder that all mods and gender changes are priced at 30 stps per word. The name change is of course free of charge. Enjoy!\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"pregnancy", "Rev":1.9, "RevTime":"1690850529", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1690850529", "TimeClosed":"1690850529", "TimeFiled":"1663522058" ])

([ "Account":"robertg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of Curves and Blocks. Scribbly yellow and orange leaves swirl over the blocky bricks. Simple blobs form dark silhouettes of people going about their business. Brighter creamy strokes form the curves of a woman. Her bright blue eyes show curiosity as she peers at you. That would determine his current age now. Sometimes the return on @age is wonky, so I wouldn't trust that. Let me know what his actual age is and I'll try to determine if the qualifier needs to be altered from young man to just man.\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"new", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1670831820", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1670831820", "TimeClosed":"1670831820", "TimeFiled":"1670452734" ])

([ "Account":"random1377", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"How much are we permitted to BlueBook interactions with NPC-led entities when it comes to player-run initiatives, and how much needs to be run by Staff first? The Italian Consulate is planning to run a \\"Donation Drive\\" style event, and partner with Saint Christopher's Soup Kitchen to provide items \\"to the less fortunate\\" (who are, for the most part, the bluebooked NPCs of the city). On the same note: If there are no current PCs involved with, say, the Royal Family Household, how do we reach out to the Royal Family? Additionally, is there way to do custom auction house imports, or is that ONLY able to be handled through the automated Trading screen in @guilds? (I guess I just have a lot of questions about what it means to run a VP-style guild like a Consulate). Thanks! :)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:fa:faust", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Plazas:PiazzaDiGioco:02", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Dec 12 01:34): You say, \\"How much are we permitted to BlueBook interactions with NPC-led entities when it comes to player-run initiatives, and how much needs to be run by Staff first? SO LONG AS IT DOES NOT EFFECT THE NARRATIVE OF THE GAME OR MANDATE STAFF INTERVENTION, AND MATCHES THE OVERALL THEME OF THE GAME, YOU SHOULD BE GOOD TO GO! The Italian Consulate is planning to run a \\"Donation Drive\\" style event, and partner with Saint Christopher's Soup Kitchen to provide items \\"to the less fortunate\\" (who are, for the most part, the bluebooked NPCs of the city). MONETARY DONATIONS CAN BE DONATED TO THE CHURCH SINCE THE SOUP KITCHEN IS RUN BY THE CHURCH. On the same note: If there are no current PCs involved with, say, the Royal Family Household, how do we reach out to the Royal Family? ALWAYS DEFAULT TO SENDING THESE QUESTIONS TO ALONZO, I RUN HIM AND HE RUNS THE SHOW FOR THE ROYAL FAMILY. Additionally, is there way to do custom auction house imports, or is that ONLY able to be handled through the automated Trading screen in @guilds? (I guess I just have a lot of questions about what it means to run a VP-style guild like a Consulate). CUSTOM IMPORTS WOULD BE HANDLED BY THE ROYALS SO AGAIN, THAT WOULD BE ALONZO.\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"new", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1670826854", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1670826854", "TimeClosed":"1670826854", "TimeFiled":"1670558396" ])

([ "Account":"robertg", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! PAINTING ! painting of a Small Shiny Woman. The bright shape of a woman shines against a gray couch, almost blindingly. A nearby fire brings warm light to her skin and her golden clothes. Little bits of jewelry glisten all over her. She smiles with a bit of pride, holding cigars in one hand and whiskey in the other. Waves of lavish platinum blonde hair flow behind her. ([ "Account":"aoetwo", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! SCULPTURE ! sculpture of a stonemason chiseling a statue. This large granite statue stands on a square granite plinth and depicts a huge man laboriously, meticulously, carving an unfinished statue before him. The man is huge, more than six and a half feet tall. His hair is long and shaggy, flowing unkemptly over his back. His eyes are deep-set into his craggy and lined face, and they are staring focusedly at where his chisel is carving into an unfinished statue with human form before him. Scraggly eyebrows contract with his focused expression. His nose is large and prominent above his dour-looking mouth with thick lips. His jaw has been carved into a rugged shape, and completely covered with a shaggy and unkept beard.\\r\\n\\r\\nOn base of the plinth, the words \\"Prestige Statuary\\" have been carved in large letters with an elaborate and stylish design. (\<[IronClaw:Props:Misc:Decorations:Statue]#90433\>)", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:ro:rockwell", "Environment":"[Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Southeast:Tavern:SecondFloor:Room01]#5774", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962053", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962053", "TimeClosed":"1686962053", "TimeFiled":"1670945291" ])

([ "Account":"lidiab", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Lidia's engraved lustrous coin pearl and antique filigreed silver drop necklace:\<[Allegory:Props:Jewelry:Necklace:DropNecklace]#308078\> -\> Delicate, twining structures of leaf-like appendages surround a risen apex of pearl at the center of the pendant, the entirety taking form in the shape of a tiny, stylized golden snowflake set against the nacre backdrop of the coin pearl disk. Silver filigree filaments bow outward from the central ornamentation, creating intricate fretwork spandrels, surrounding accentuations which are almost floral in nature. ([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"I would like to propose the chance for a character to learn a third skill set. This could only happen after the first two skill sets have been maxed, and the third skill set's skills could not be raise above level 12. All stats from the first two sets could not be raised above 48 is they were \\"crossover skills\\". This would only be to help flush out characters for RP purposes, and limiting them to lvl 12 in all their skills for the third skill set would prevent them from being \\"masters\\" in all skills. Something to think about. ([ "Account":"pink_star2", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"Hellloooo! So i've looked into careers and I'm just still a little bit confused. For Kaitlyn (my alt) she has two, socialite and socialite but Milli is just one..I've also tried to get Milli to learn other fighting techniques like whip and she isn't able too. I'm not sure if she's broken of it's just the system?? xxx", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:mi:milli", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Plazas:PiazzaVecchia:Fountain", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jan 30 00:12): Page added to Milli's pending pages: \\"[Jan 30 00:11] You can learn two classes. Each class will unlock the skills in that class. Since you have both classes as the same in Kaitlyn, you can stack those skills. Since you only have one class in Milli, you can only learn the skills in that class. To unlock a second class, you would need to learn that class from one of the NPC trainers. I would suggest you read the help files under the section that outlines each class and the skills associated with that class. Hope that helps!\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"new", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1675055525", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1675055525", "TimeClosed":"1675055525", "TimeFiled":"1675036161" ])

([ "Account":"conair", "Assigned":"", "AssistText":"! ENGRAVING ! Ethan's unlit engraved verdigris copper candle lamp:\<[Allegory:Props:Lighting:CandleLamp]#298407\> -\> The fixture in which the candle is placed has been meticulously hammered and forged into the shape of an upturned magnolia blossom, held aloft from the reflective backdrop by an arm that takes the form of a broad-leaved sprig.\\r\\n \\r\\n The material has been utilized in such a way that the branch, leaves and petal-like sepals at the base of the flower have been crafted from the blue-green mottled copper of the metal's namesake, while the bloom itself shimmers coppery reflections from each petaled protuberance surrounding the candle's setting.", "Assistee":"Chatters:AE:to:topsy", "CharObj":\, "Character":"Chatters:AE:et:ethan", "Environment":"Allegory:Setting:Rinascita:Buildings:Northeast:Blacksmith:Main", "Flag":"", "Links":(\{ \}), "Notes":"\<*\> Topsy (Jun 16 20:34): (discarded)\\n\\n", "Priority":10, "Queue":"custom", "Rev":1.2, "RevTime":"1686962054", "Server":"ironclaw", "Theatre":"IC", "TimeClaimed":"1686962054", "TimeClosed":"1686962054", "TimeFiled":"1675089438" ])
